description: Provide operations for hierarchy settings defined at the management group level. Settings can only be set on the root Management Group of the hierarchy.

commands.name: az account management-group hierarchy-settings create
commands.summary: Create hierarchy settings defined at the Management Group level.
examples: az account management-group hierarchy-settings create --name GroupName
az account management-group hierarchy-settings create --name GroupName -m /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/DefaultGroup
az account management-group hierarchy-settings create --name GroupName -r True
az account management-group hierarchy-settings create --name GroupName -m /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/DefaultGroup -r True

commands.name: az account management-group hierarchy-settings delete
commands.summary: Delete the hierarchy settings defined at the Management Group level.
examples: az account management-group hierarchy-settings delete --name GroupName

commands.name: az account management-group hierarchy-settings list
commands.summary: Get all the hierarchy settings defined at the Management Group level.
examples: az account management-group hierarchy-settings list --name GroupName

commands.name: az account management-group hierarchy-settings update
commands.summary: Update the hierarchy settings defined at the Management Group level.
examples: az account management-group hierarchy-settings update --name GroupName
az account management-group hierarchy-settings update --name GroupName -m /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/DefaultGroup
az account management-group hierarchy-settings update --name GroupName -r True
az account management-group hierarchy-settings update --name GroupName -m /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/DefaultGroup -r True
